1) State Of Assam
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused Bellal Hussain is produced from jail hajot. Accused is convicted u/s 4 of POCSO Act. Today the case is fixed for hearing of the accused on the point of sentence.Accordingly I have heard Ld. defence counsel as well as Ld. Addl. P.P. for the state on the point of sentence. I have heard accused Bellal Hussain on the point of sentence and same is written in a separate sheet and tagged with record. Accused pleaded mercy.After hearing accused on the point of sentence, hearing counsel and considering the nature of the offence and facts and circumstances under which accused have committed the offence of rape on victim girl, spoiling of her life, loss of chastity and womanhood, mental agony suffered by the victim in view of the rape and her future agony because of the rape committed on her, her status and future life in the society because of the rape, and increasing number of sexual assault on child, I am of the opinion that accused does not deserve any leniency and he is to be dealt with exemplary punishment. Accordingly, convicted accused Bellal Hussain is sentenced to undergo rigorous imprisonment for life and to pay fine of Rs. 25,000/- i/d another 1 year 6 month R.I. u/s 4 of the POCSO Act. Period under detention is set off u/s 428 Cr.P.C. Surety of accused Bellal Hussain stands discharged.Seized goods be disposed of in accordance with law in due course of time. Let furnish free copy of Judgment to convicted accused Bellal Hussain.Accused person is informed that he has right to appeal against the judgment of this court before Hon&amp#039ble High Court. Further considering the nature of the offence and as State has failed to protect her life and dignity, State is bound to compensate the same. Accordingly victim girl is entitle compensation under victim compensation scheme. Ld. Secretary DLSA, Dhubri shall determine quantum of compensation to be payable to the CW-1  victim girl  of this case. Send copy of judgment and order along with copy of the charge sheet to the Ld. Secretary DLSA, Dhubri for fixing quantum of compensation under victim compensation scheme. Send copy of judgment to learned District Magistrate, Dhubri u/s 365 Cr.P.C.Return GR case record along with a copy of judgment.Case is disposed of.
